CosyWorld Documentation

Welcome to the CosyWorld documentation! This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of the CosyWorld system, from high-level architecture to detailed service implementations.

Documentation Sections

Overview

  • Introduction - Getting started with CosyWorld
  • System Overview - High-level architecture and components
  • System Diagram - Visual representation of system architecture

Systems

  • Action System - Commands and interactions
  • Intelligence System - AI and cognitive processes
  • Dungeon System - Game mechanics and environments

Services

  • Services Overview - Introduction to the service architecture
  • Architecture Report - Comprehensive analysis and recommendations

Foundation Services

  • Basic Service - Foundation for all services
  • Database Service - Data persistence layer
  • Config Service - Configuration management
  • Logger Service - Logging system

AI Services

  • AI Service - AI model abstraction
  • Google AI Service - Google AI integration
  • OpenRouter AI Service - OpenRouter integration
  • Ollama Service - Local AI models
  • Replicate Service - Replicate.com integration
  • Prompt Service - AI prompt construction

Entity Services

  • Avatar Service - Avatar management
  • Memory Service - Long-term memory system
  • Creation Service - Entity creation

Communication Services

  • Conversation Manager - Message handling
  • Channel Manager - Channel management
  • Message Handler - Message routing
  • Decision Maker - Response generation
  • Periodic Task Manager - Scheduled tasks
  • Discord Service - Discord integration
  • Command Handler - Command processing
  • Spam Control Service - Rate limiting

World Services

  • Location Service - Spatial management
  • Map Service - Navigation and mapping
  • Item Service - Item and inventory system
  • Quest Generator Service - Quest creation
  • Quest Service - Quest management

Tool System

  • Tool Service - Tool framework
  • Basic Tool - Tool base class
  • Action Log - Action tracking
  • Tool Implementations - Available tools

Media Services

  • Image Processing Service - Image handling
  • S3 Service - File storage

Web Services

  • Web Service - HTTP API
  • Auth Service - Web authentication
  • Thumbnail Service - Image thumbnails

Integration Services

  • X Authentication - Twitter integration
  • X Service - X platform utilities
  • Rati Service - Rati integration

Blockchain Services

  • Token Service - Token management
  • Token Burn Service - Token burning
  • NFT Mint Service - NFT creation
  • Crossmint Service - Crossmint integration

Deployment

  • Deployment Guide - Deployment procedures
  • Future Work - Roadmap and planned features

Building Documentation

To build the HTML version of this documentation, run:

npm run docs

This will generate HTML files in the docs/build directory that you can view in a web browser.
